name: sales_by_film_category
query: select `c`.`name` AS `category`,sum(`p`.`amount`) AS `total_sales` from (((((`payment` `p` join `rental` `r` on(`p`.`rental_id` = `r`.`rental_id`)) join `inventory` `i` on(`r`.`inventory_id` = `i`.`inventory_id`)) join `film` `f` on(`i`.`film_id` = `f`.`film_id`)) join `film_category` `fc` on(`f`.`film_id` = `fc`.`film_id`)) join `category` `c` on(`fc`.`category_id` = `c`.`category_id`)) group by `c`.`name` order by sum(`p`.`amount`) desc
